'''1.19.73''' is a hotfix to [[Bedrock Edition|''Bedrock Edition'']] released on March 29, 2023, which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/14410802894477|title=Minecraft - 1.19.73 (Bedrock)|website=Minecraft Feedback|date=March 29, 2023}}</ref>

While this wasn't the last update to 1.19.0, it was the last one before the beta/''Preview'' builds of [[Bedrock Edition 1.20.0|1.20.0]] started.

== Fixes ==
* Fixed several crashes that could occur during gameplay.
* Fixed a crash that could occur with Command Blocks using teleport commands.
* Fixed a bug where the player's aim height was not adjusting correctly when sneaking. ({{bug|MCPE-167559}})
* The first player in a splitscreen game will no longer have their input interrupted by other players opening up a container or inventory screen. ({{bug|MCPE-168610}})
* Fixed an issue where Ghast volume and volume distance were too low. ({{bug|MCPE-168324}})
* Fixed duplicate tooltips appearing when selecting item in the inventory while using touch controls. ({{bug|MCPE-166866}})
